titleStmt.title: Digital description of MS. Heb. b. 9

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906, No. 2817.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact oriental@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.title: Genesis xi. 32 (שנים) to xiii. 7 (והפרזי)
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

msItem.title: Genesis l. 5 (את אבי) to the end of the book
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.
Colophon קדש ליהוה אל[הי] ישראל לכניסת[א] דמויה לא י... ולא יגאל ... מוכרו וארור ... אמן.

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Exodus xxv. 1 to 5 with interlinear Arabic translation
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

msItem.title: Lamentations for the ninth of Ab

msItem.p: [אהלי אני עבטתי] Zunz, p. 47, no. 7, beg. missing;
beg. אלה לו געוני, Zunz, p. 48, no. 17?;
beg. אהלי איכה הומאס, Zunz, p. 50, no. 44;
beg. איכה אלי יקוננו, Zunz, p. 48, no. 13, א̇ב̇ incomplete;

msItem.note: without vowel points.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. and Rabb. char.; fol., paper, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Deuteronomy; Joshua
Deuteronomy xxxiii. 10 (באפך) to the end of the book
msItem.note:
with a colophon of which the following words are legible:
אני משה בן יוסי (?) הלבלר כתבתי ונקדתי בע[זרת] אלהי זה המחזור ליצחק בן יוסף המערבי יזכור אותם ...
With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

msItem.title: Malachi iii. 1 (ומלאך) to the end of the book
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

Colophon (in Rabb. char.) אילו שמונה ספרי הנביאים הקדישה אותם רחל בת שלמה דמתחכים חדיד בר איוב בר שלמה בר שתון בר מרב כשיתא לכניסת הירושלמים בפסטאט מצרים שיקראו בהם בבית הכנסת לא ימכר ולא יגאל וכל המוכרו וממשכנו וגונבו ארור הוא לאלהי ישראל ויהוי בשמתא דייי ובקללת יהושע בר נון ובקללת יהודה בר יחזקאל והמקדישו והשומרו והקורא בו יתברך בברכת אבינו אברהם וכל ישראל בכלל הברכה אמן.

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

msItem.title: Biblical verses for the Sabbath, in scroll-form
msItem.note: beg. with Exodus xxxi. 13 to 17, followed by Exodus xxxv. 1 to 3, Leviticus xxiii. 1 to 3, Numbers xxviii. 9, 10.
With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Fragment of a scroll containing Haftaroth

msItem.p: for י̇ה̇כ̇ למנחה, beg. missing, at the end Micah vii. 18-20;
headed יומא קמא דחג הסכות, beg. Zechariah xiii. 9;
headed שני של חג סכות, incomplete.

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: A Masoretic fragment
msItem.note: enumerating the proper names beg. with ג, beg. with those in the book of Judges, and ending with Ecclesiastes; the books are not in the usual order.

physDesc.p: Syr. curs. (some squ.) char.; fol., vellum, obliterated.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Deuteronomy xxxiv. 11 (ולכל עבדיו) to the end of the book
msItem.note: followed by a list of the Sidras in the book of Genesis, with the number of verses, etc.
With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

msItem.title: A list of differences between Ben Asher and Ben Naftali
msItem.note: (much injured), beg. with יראה לו השה לעלה (Genesis xxii. 8), ending אשר ילד לו במצרים (Genesis xlvi. 27).

physDesc.p: Or. squ. char.; 3 coll., large 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought through the Rev. Prof. Sayce, 1896 (from the Genizah).

term.ref: Rachel dtr of Solomon (= חדיד) b. Job.
Solomon (= חדיד ) b. Job b. Solomon.
Ben Asher (Abu Saʿid Aaron b. Moses).
Lectionary. Index of verses in the Sidras.
